document_data.name: Vane
document_data.mainbody: '''Vane''' was a member in the [[Golden Legion]] during the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]], and a companion of the officer [[Alvarro]].
document_data.History:
Vane took part in the [[Maztica]]n expedition as one of the cavalry.

He was at his superior's side during the battle at [[Palul]] and was taking care of the horses when Alvarro tried to rape [[Erixitl]]. Vane was killed from behind by the furious [[Halloran]], who went to save his lover.
